header.title: Bot Start Guide
header.subtitle: Start your own AI trading bot with a simple 3-step setup suitable for beginners.

step1.title: 1. API Key Setup
step1.desc: Issue an API Key from the exchange and register it in the 'API Config' menu.

step2.title: 2. Strategy Config
step2.desc: Select a desired trading strategy and configure risk management parameters.

step3.title: 3. Create & Start Bot
step3.desc: Create a bot based on the configured strategy and start automated trading.

items.trade: Please activate the 'Trade' permission in the exchange API settings.
items.ip: Setting up an IP whitelist enhances security.

items.smallAmount: Start with a small amount to test the bot initially.
items.leverage: It is safe to set leverage low, between 3x and 5x.
items.pause: Pausing the bot during high volatility market conditions is also a strategy.
